original: @253a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @253a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ga ne shva ra sya sta ba:/
analyzed: ga ne shva ra sya sta ba:/
translated: Ganesa-stava

original: bod skad du /üîΩtshogs kyi dbang phyug gi bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩPraise of the Lord of the Assembly

original: tshogs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the Assembly.

original: tshogs chen rgyal po rgyal bar 'grub mdzad pa //
analyzed: tshogs chen rgyal po rgyal bar 'grub mdzad pa //
translated: Accomplisher of victory, king of the great assembly,

original: mche ba gtsigs byed gang chen dbang po'i zhal //
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs byed gang chen dbang po'i zhal //
translated: With bared fangs, face of the lord of the great ocean,

original: gdong mdzes skyes bu mchog gi mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: gdong mdzes skyes bu mchog gi mtshan nyid can //
translated: Beautiful face, characteristic of the supreme being,

original: tshogs dbang rgyal po mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshogs dbang rgyal po mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the supreme king, lord of the assembly.

original: lha rdzas rin chen mchog gis brgyan pa'i sku //
analyzed: lha rdzas rin chen mchog gis brgyan pa'i sku //
translated: Body adorned with the supreme divine jewels,

original: zhabs gdub g-yo zhing rgyas pa'i zhabs zung ni //
analyzed: zhabs gdub g-yo zhing rgyas pa'i zhabs zung ni //
translated: With jingling anklets, your two feet

original: cig car kun rdzob don dam bden mchog nyid //
analyzed: cig car kun rdzob don dam bden mchog nyid //
translated: Simultaneously the supreme relative and ultimate truths,

original: tshogs mchog rgyal po'i dbang por phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshogs mchog rgyal po'i dbang por phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the lord of the king of the supreme assembly.üîΩWith pure goodness, entering the battle to conquer the afflictions,

original: dam pa'i dag pas gzhom bya'i g-yul du 'jug / g-yul rgyal 'bar ba'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: dam pa'i dag pas gzhom bya'i g-yul du 'jug / g-yul rgyal 'bar ba'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams //
translated: Holding in your hand the blazing weapon of victory in battle,

original: zhabs mchog 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug cod pan te //
analyzed: zhabs mchog 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug cod pan te //
translated: Your supreme feet are the crown of the lord of the earth,

original: rgyal mchog tshogs kyi dbang por phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: rgyal mchog tshogs kyi dbang por phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the supreme king, the lord of the assembly.

original: 'dam skyes dam pa lta bu'i phyag dang zhabs //
analyzed: 'dam skyes dam pa lta bu'i phyag dang zhabs //
translated: With hands and feet like a holy lotus,

original: ma lus rab 'byam rnam par 'phro mdzad cing //
analyzed: ma lus rab 'byam rnam par 'phro mdzad cing //
translated: Radiating light throughout the entire vast universe,

original: mchog gi gzhu 'dra'i dri ma med spyan can //
analyzed: mchog gi gzhu 'dra'i dri ma med spyan can //
translated: Having eyes as pure as the supreme bow,

original: rgyal po tshogs dbang mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: rgyal po tshogs dbang mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the supreme king, the lord of the assembly.

original: yon tan 'byung ba'i grags 'chang 'phags mchog ni //
analyzed: yon tan 'byung ba'i grags 'chang 'phags mchog ni //
translated: The supreme noble one, bearing the fame of the source of qualities,

original: 'dzin ma'i dbang po'i stobs las stobs gyur bgegs //
analyzed: 'dzin ma'i dbang po'i stobs las stobs gyur bgegs //
translated: Overcoming obstacles with the strength of the lord of the earth,

original: phyag gi stobs 'dra bdud las nges rgyal ba //
analyzed: phyag gi stobs 'dra bdud las nges rgyal ba //
translated: Defeating Mara with the strength of his hands,

original: dbang phyug tshogs mchog rgyal la phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug tshogs mchog rgyal la phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the king, the supreme lord of the assembly.

original: skye bo gter dang rin chen ros tshim zhing //
analyzed: skye bo gter dang rin chen ros tshim zhing //
translated: Satisfying beings with the nectar of jewels and wealth,

original: bdud rtsi chen po'i ro mchog rgyas gyur pas //
analyzed: bdud rtsi chen po'i ro mchog rgyas gyur pas //
translated: Expanding the supreme taste of the great nectar,üîΩThe supreme patience for those suffering from the fear of existence and the fear of Mara,

original: srid 'jigs 'jigs pas nyam thag bzod pa'i mchog / rgyal dbang tshogs kyi mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: srid 'jigs 'jigs pas nyam thag bzod pa'i mchog / rgyal dbang tshogs kyi mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the lord of the assembly, the king.

original: brtson pas legs bsgrubs mtshan nyid bde ba ni //
analyzed: brtson pas legs bsgrubs mtshan nyid bde ba ni //
translated: The bliss that is well accomplished through diligence,

original: sems can yid kyi shing rta gang ba'i bde'i //
analyzed: sems can yid kyi shing rta gang ba'i bde'i //
translated: The supreme truth of the delight of beings' mental chariots filled with the delight of the assembly of the supreme lord of the assembly,

original: gtam la mngon par zhen pa'i bden pa mchog / tshogs @253b mchog dbang phyug rgyal por phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: gtam la mngon par zhen pa'i bden pa mchog / tshogs @253b mchog dbang phyug rgyal por phyag bgyi'o //
translated: I pay homage to the king.

original: bgegs kyi bdag po dam pa la ni bstod pa'i me //
analyzed: bgegs kyi bdag po dam pa la ni bstod pa'i me //
translated: The fire of praise to the excellent lord of obstacles,

original: nags kyi rin chen gyis byas dge ba rab thob pas //
analyzed: nags kyi rin chen gyis byas dge ba rab thob pas //
translated: having obtained the virtue created by the jewel of the forest,

original: bgegs zad srid las rgyal ba'i pha rol sbyin pa las //
analyzed: bgegs zad srid las rgyal ba'i pha rol sbyin pa las //
translated: through the exhaustion of obstacles, the attainment of victory over existence, and the perfection of generosity,

original: skye bo don dam tshul du mnyam pa nyid gyur cig / tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: skye bo don dam tshul du mnyam pa nyid gyur cig / tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
translated: may beings attain the ultimate equality.

original: slob dpon dpal nags kyi rin chen zhabs kyis mdzad pa yang dag par gang ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dpal nags kyi rin chen zhabs kyis mdzad pa yang dag par gang ba'o //
translated: The praise of the Lord of the Assembly, composed by the master ≈örƒ´-Vana-ratna-pƒÅda, is complete.

original: 'di ni dngos grub brnyes pa'i dbang phyug pandi ta chen po de nyid kyis dpal bal po'i yul gyi grong khyer chen po ye rang gi dgon pa shr'i go bi tsandra nas //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos grub brnyes pa'i dbang phyug pandi ta chen po de nyid kyis dpal bal po'i yul gyi grong khyer chen po ye rang gi dgon pa shr'i go bi tsandra nas //
translated: This was given as a gift by the great lord and accomplished pa·πá·∏çita himself from the ≈örƒ´-Govi-ca·πá·∏ça monastery in the great city of Ye-rang in the glorious country of Nepal,

original: dngos grub mchog gi bka' drin gyis btsa' ba'i phyir skyes su stsal ba /
analyzed: dngos grub mchog gi bka' drin gyis btsa' ba'i phyir skyes su stsal ba /
translated: out of a desire for the kindness of supreme accomplishment.

original: dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba'i spyi bor thob pa las /
analyzed: dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba'i spyi bor thob pa las /
translated: It was received on the crown of the head of the bhik·π£u YogƒÅcƒÅra-sƒÅgara-samudgata-dhara·πáƒ´-vikrƒ´·∏çita-rƒÅja-nƒÅma-dhƒÅra·πáƒ´-s≈´tra.

original: mi 'phrogs pa'i gus pa dang yid dga' ba mu med pas /
analyzed: mi 'phrogs pa'i gus pa dang yid dga' ba mu med pas /
translated: With unwavering respect and boundless joy,

original: skal pa chen po'i snyim par gzung zhing yi dam du bgyis te /
analyzed: skal pa chen po'i snyim par gzung zhing yi dam du bgyis te /
translated: I have held it in the palm of my great fortune and taken it as my commitment.

original: nor bu rgyas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por bod kyi skad du bsgyur nas gzhan la'ang sbyin par bya ba'i chos su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: nor bu rgyas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por bod kyi skad du bsgyur nas gzhan la'ang sbyin par bya ba'i chos su bgyis pa'o //
translated: Having translated it into the Tibetan language at the great temple of Norbu Gyepa, I have made it a Dharma to be given to others as well.

original: 'di sa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dong pa mtha' dag bdag dang gzhan du 'byor bar gyur cig /
analyzed: 'di sa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dong pa mtha' dag bdag dang gzhan du 'byor bar gyur cig /
translated: May this be a means for myself and others to attain all mundane and supramundane accomplishments.
